item.title: Soatok
item.description: An Interview With Soatok Dreamseeker # 12/3/2020 Thank you for taking the time for this interview Soatok. Your blog at https://soatok.blog shows that you’re a furry crypto nerd, but I’d like to hear how you’d put it, so, to get started, can you describe yourself? Whenever I’m asked, I usually say something to the effect of, “I’m a security engineer with a dhole fursona that sometimes writes about cryptography on my furry blog.

item.title: Loial
item.description: An Interview With Loial Otter # 9/23/2018 Introduction: I’m Matthew or LoialOtter, a crazy person up in western Canada who likes to make stuff. I work at Kron Technology as an engineer mainly in FPGA, electronics design and hardware design. I don’t have any credentials except a certificate in baking and pastry arts. I’m self-taught mostly due to not being ever able to afford going to school. I suggest others do when the have the opportunity but it isn’t absolutely required.
